item.title: About
item.description: I studied Philosophy for a time, then I left to attend a web development bootcamp. Now I write software. Along the way I taught at a different bootcamp for two years. I’m also into playing guitar and chasing my dog.

item.title: Projects
item.description: Eonomics Fight economicsfight.com (In Progress) “competitive voting” app Get PowerUps For Casting Votes Includes changing rate-limits includes HTTP and gRPC api’s Bitter Domain (source) A Ruby gem for generating domains 1 bit away from a source domain and checking the availability of the generated domains. Presented at the nyc-meetup 1-8-2020 VFS Service (source) Virtual File System HTTP Client
